full_summary:
================disable_tender_announcement
### Dive Inspection at Seven Sites Solicitation 

#### Solicitation Number
30003426

#### Solicitation Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Tender Status
Expired Solicitation (Note: Previously open for bidding, now closed.)

#### Notice Type
RFP Invitation

#### Scope of Work

Fisheries and Oceans Canada, in collaboration with the Canadian Coast Guard, invites bidders to provide dive inspection services at seven (7) marine aid to navigation piers. The work includes:

- Mobilization to and demobilization from the various sites
- Underwater inspection of the piers
- Compilation of a detailed inspection report for each site
- Identification of the condition of all inspected components and provision of photographs

#### Background Information

The Canadian Coast Guard, Central Region, is responsible for undertaking this project.

#### Security Requirements

There are no security requirements associated with this contract.

#### Period of Contract

The period of contract shall be from the date of award to 31 March 2023.

#### Evaluation Criteria

A comprehensive evaluation of proposals will be conducted based on qualifications and experience.

### How to Respond

Documents related to this solicitation can be found at [canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

Prospective bidders are requested to submit their proposals by the closing date of 13 December 2022, 14:00 EST.

Please note that Canadians and residents of Canada are encouraged to bid on this contract. When creating an account, ensure you are completing the fields on the Bidding name field, identifying your company correctly.

Bidders must include proof of certification, qualifications, dependencies, and company details within the presentation of each outline.

Documents required should be sent in the English format, initiating a response from the state of trading fish underwater variety seaworthiness accountability association.
